title: google font for a website logo
content:
I have this logo image on my website and for seo purposes would like to change it into a text logo. So, need to know, which google font is the most similar to the image logo text.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017161332im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logo_3525.png)

the website: [http://www.dietetik.si/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017161332/http:/www.dietetik.si/ "http://www.dietetik.si/")

any suggestions for a google font would be appreciated,

thank you
author: oswaldo

comments.content:
You can try a few:  
Quantico, Monda, Aldrich, Michrona or Syncopate

For seo purposes, you can also keep the logo as a background image, and use some CSS to hide the text: [https://www.google.com/search?q=css+logo+replacement](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017161332/https:/www.google.com/search?q=css+logo+replacement "https://www.google.com/search?q=css+logo+replacement")
Than you PabloImpallari, that's a great solution. I allready found Michrona, so will see if will keep it or use css..
